styles.name: High-Tech Realistic Materials
styles.description: Physically-based rendering (PBR) textures, ceramics, glazes, and real-world color/material simulation for digital art and 3D models. Inspired by Ruth Borgenicht ceramics and couture fantasy.

styles.name: Ceramic & Glaze Simulation
styles.description: Digital recreation of ceramic surfaces, glazes, and handmade textures for virtual canvases and 3D objects.

styles.name: Archetypal RPG/Board Game Style
styles.description: Playful, modular, archetype-driven art and UI inspired by tarot, BETWIXT, and cozy board games. Tarot archetypes act as creative guides or workers, helping users generate art and experiments from real sources.
styles.workerSystem: Tarot archetypes as instruction/worker modules for creative experiments.

purpose: Enable creative experiments and digital art when physical space is limited. Connect style requests to future arcanae-lab modules and RPG-like archetype worker systems.
